data.name: richTextBox1.Text
data.value:
Last Updated: 8 Aug 2024
Welcome to Travel Box. By signing up and using our services, you agree to comply with and be bound by the following terms and conditions ("Terms"). Please review these Terms carefully before using our services.
1. Acceptance of Terms By accessing, using, or signing up for any services provided by Travel Box, you agree to these Terms. If you do not agree to these Terms, please do not use our services.
2. Eligibility You must be at least 18 years old to use our services. By using our services, you represent and warrant that you meet this requirement.
3. Account Registration You agree to provide accurate and complete information when creating an account with us. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account information, including your password, and for all activities that occur under your account.
4. Privacy Policy Your privacy is important to us. Please review our Privacy Policy to understand how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.
5. Booking and Payments Booking: All bookings are subject to availability and are not confirmed until full payment is received. Payments: You agree to pay all fees and charges associated with your booking. Payment terms and conditions will be provided at the time of booking. Cancellations and Refunds: Cancellation and refund policies vary depending on the service booked. Please review our Cancellation Policy for more details. 6. Travel Documents You are responsible for ensuring that you have the necessary travel documents (e.g., passports, visas) and comply with the laws, regulations, and policies of the destinations you are visiting.
7. Changes and Modifications We reserve the right to modify or cancel any booking, service, or part of these Terms at our discretion. If a change affects your booking, we will notify you as soon as possible.
8. User Conduct You agree to use our services for lawful purposes only. You must not:
Use our services in any way that violates applicable local, national, or international law. Use our services to transmit or distribute viruses, malware, or other harmful code. Engage in any conduct that restricts or inhibits anyone's use or enjoyment of our services. 9. Liability Limitation of Liability: [Your Travel Agency Name] shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising out of or in connection with your use of our services. Force Majeure: We are not responsible for delays, cancellations, or other issues caused by events beyond our control, such as natural disasters, strikes, or government actions. 10. Dispute Resolution Any disputes arising out of or relating to these Terms or your use of our services shall be resolved through amicable negotiation. If the dispute cannot be resolved through negotiation, it will be submitted to binding arbitration in accordance with the laws of Jurisdiction.
11. Governing Law These Terms are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Jurisdiction, without regard to its conflict of law principles.
12. Termination We reserve the right to terminate or suspend your account and access to our services at our discretion, without notice, for conduct that we believe violates these Terms or is harmful to other users or us.
13. Changes to Terms We may update these Terms from time to time. Any changes will be posted on our website, and your continued use of our services constitutes acceptance of the revised Terms.
14. Contact Us If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us at:
Email: travelbox@gmail.com Phone: 0122222222222
